name: Mini Sundaes with Caramel Sauce
description: One of the sweetest taste-trends today is salted caramel. Enjoy this mini dessert with luxurious caramel sauce and a little of Epicure’s Sea Salt.
preparation: Combine whipping cream with Hot Buttered Rum in a Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup and bring to a boil for 3–5 minutes. Cool to room temperature. Stir in vanilla extract.
Using a stainless steel mini portion scoop, scoop ice cream into verrines or other small glasses. Drizzle with caramel sauce and serve with Sea Salt, if desired.
